Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

::Kaiser::
       He nods willingly and draws his two blades.  He holds his two curved 
scimitars in a crossed defensive stance in front of his face.  With the free 
fingers of one hand he beckons for Deathsteel to make the first move.  "Come 
on Deathsteel, let's see how you handle yourself.  Have at me!"

--part1_14c.1d6d5dff.2bb10164_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable
